record.description: Summer at the University of Chicago. The 100-acre campus is located on both sides of the Midway Plaisance in historic Hyde Park on Chicago's south side. The University is privately-endowed, coeducational, and non-denominational and was founded in 1890 by John D. Rockefeller.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamps: File Copy Please Return; Please return to the Office of Public Relations University of Chicago; This is the property of the Office of Public Relation the University of Chicago
